mission.posting: Gather a much-needed tool in preparation for the endgame with Unity.

email.subject: Gathering Resources - #PLAYERNAME#
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, The time to take down Unity is rapidly approaching. However, we cannot take them down without one very important asset. You may remember from last year when you infiltrated my network, you came across a program called RTSPCrack. Unfortunately, this program was wiped from everyone's computer during the government takeover of hellSec and, of course, my arrest. Your task will be to recover this program. I will link you to a place that has it. Once you find it, upload it to the drop server.
Good luck, -Z3r0

attachments.note: Find RTSPCrack.exe Upload to drop server
